text:
Stoyanka Mutafova (née Stoyana-Maria Konstantinova Mutafova;; 2 February 1922 – 6 December 2019) was a famous Bulgarian actress. During her career, she starred in over 53 theatrical plays and 25 movies.
Mutafova was nicknamed "Ms. Natural Disaster" for a play she performs in and "The Queen of Bulgarian comedy", she was an official applicant for a Guinness Book of World Record as the actress with the longest active professional career.
At the age of 94 in 2016, she toured the theater halls in major cities of the United States, Canada, the Netherlands, Switzerland, Great Britain and Germany.
Mutafova died on 6 December 2019 in Sofia at the age of 97.
